name: NonScrollable
description: Blocks scrolling while positionable components are displayed.

attributes.name: disableScroll
attributes.description: Instructs the component to disable scrolling of the host page (or component) when a positionable panel has been opened by the user. Because Strand disables scrolling by capturing pointer events, if there is a desire to allow clicks outside of the positionable panel (such as a target strand-icon, in the case of a strand-tooltip) set this property to 'false'.
